author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: standalone swagger-ui server backed by nedb
name: swagger-lite

scripts.build-doc: MODE_LINENO=0 utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "module.exports={ exampleFileList:['README.md','test.js','index.js'], moduleDict:{ 'swagger-lite':{aliasList:['swgg'],exports:require('./index.js')}, 'swagger-lite.Nedb.prototype':{aliasList:['collection'], exports:require('./index.js').Nedb.prototype}, 'swagger-lite.api':{aliasList:['api'],exports:require('./index.js').api}, 'swagger-lite.tools.v2':{aliasList:['tools.v2'], exports:require('./index.js').tools.v2.__proto__} } }"
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover node test.js
scripts.test: export MODE_LINENO=0 && utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test node test.js
